tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_demographics (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    income DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    city VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10,2),
    quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR,
  location VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
  purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  product_name VARCHAR,
  purchase_date DATE,
  price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE demographics (
  demographic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  income DECIMAL,
  education_level VARCHAR,
  occupation VARCHAR
);
CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,customer_name VARCHAR(255),customer_age INT,customer_gender VARCHAR(10),customer_location VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE products (product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,product_name VARCHAR(255),product_category VARCHAR(50),product_price DECIMAL(10,2));
CREATE TABLE purchases (purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,customer_id INT,product_id INT,purchase_date DATE,purchase_quantity INT,purchase_total DECIMAL(10,2));
CREATE TABLE target_audience (audience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,audience_name VARCHAR(255),audience_demographic VARCHAR(50),audience_interests VARCHAR(255));

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    purchase_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    brand VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE demographics (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    income INT,
    education_level VARCHAR(50),
    occupation VARCHAR(50),
    marital_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE target_audience (
    audience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audience_name VARCHAR(50),
    age_group VARCHAR(20),
    interests TEXT,
    buying_behavior TEXT
)
